long_description: Conditioner for smooth-finished full-grain leather--restores supple feel to dried-out leather, or use on new boots to reduce break-in time. Safe for footwear with waterproof or breathable linings like Gore-Tex(R), and can be applied to wet or dry leather. Made of a water-based emulsion of TX.10 polymer, tanning agents and leather conditioners. Easy-to-use sponge applicator is included for effective applications. Polymer actually adds water-repellency to leather that is long-lasting and durable.
short_description: Conditioner for smooth-finished full-grain leather--restores supple feel to dried-out leather, or use on new boots to reduce break-in time.
